rows.label: qst200232_msg0001
rows.name: You get it now?!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0002
rows.name: Justice! Never! Loses!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0003
rows.name: ...Well, I guess he can't really hear me.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0004
rows.name:
I...I can't believe it...
All this happened because of me...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't turn away! You need to look at
what you've done and accept it!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0006
rows.name:
All I wanted was to make my mother
well again and give her a good life...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0007
rows.name: How did it end up like this...?

rows.label: qst200232_msg0008
rows.name:
That villain took advantage
of your feelings...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0009
rows.name:
That villain took advantage
of your feelings...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0010
rows.name:
That villain saw in your feelings an
opportunity, and took advantage...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0011
rows.name:
That villain twisted your pure feelings
into something awful.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0012
rows.name: I wanted my mother to be well again...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0013
rows.name:
For the sake of saving her, I thought
I could justify anything...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0014
rows.name:
But I was wrong. There's no
forgiving what I've done.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0015
rows.name:
All I can do now is give up
my life in repentance...!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0016
rows.name: You idiot!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0017
rows.name:
You really think dying is going
to make anything right?!
You're stronger than that!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0018
rows.name:
If you're really sorry for what you've
done, then make up for it by helping
people instead of hurting them!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0019
rows.name:
Or what, you think your mother and
Krujah would want you to throw
your life away?

rows.label: qst200232_msg0020
rows.name: Now, eyes up front!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0021
rows.name:
If you really have the will to repent,
I'll help you through it all!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0022
rows.name:
Ahhhh...
Aaaahhhhh...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0023
rows.name:
I'm...so sorry...
Thank you...so much...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0024
rows.name:
I guess it's not easy to follow
the path of justice...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0025
rows.name:
It's easy to talk about justice,
but actually following through...
that can't be easy.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0026
rows.name: The path of justice is a difficult one...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0027
rows.name:
There's a lot of weight behind that
little word "justice"...

rows.label: qst200232_msg0028
rows.name:
Justice isn't that complicated.
It's pretty simple, really.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0029
rows.name:
It's just that everyone thinks too
hard about it, so they lose sight
of what really matters.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0030
rows.name:
So I figure my job is to forge a
shining path to stop people from
losing their way!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0031
rows.name:
I'm counting on you to help me
with that, partner!
